item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, October 25, 2024 at 2:50 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Bitwarden SDK relicensed from proprietary to GPLv3 (167 points | 30 comments)
2. Quantized Llama models with increased speed and a reduced memory footprint (277 points | 64 comments)
3. OpenFeature – a vendor-agnostic, community-driven API for feature flagging (18 points | discuss)
4. Launch HN: Skyvern (YC S23) – open-source AI agent for browser automations (244 points | 54 comments)
5. Why Safety Profiles Failed (93 points | 53 comments)
6. Security research on Private Cloud Compute (194 points | 51 comments)
7. Zigler: Zig NIFs in Elixir (151 points | 48 comments)
8. Never Missing the Train Again (183 points | 59 comments)
9. Show HN: Rust based AWS Lambda Logs Viewer (TUI) (8 points | 3 comments)
10. Brush – A new compatible Gaussian splatting engine (95 points | 25 comments)
11. Show HN: 2048 turned 10 this year, I built an updated version to celebrate (471 points | 166 comments)
12. Post World War II Food (163 points | 125 comments)
13. Lingo: A Go micro language framework for building Domain Specific Languages (61 points | 17 comments)
14. When Samsung meets MediaTek: the story of a small bug chain [pdf] (19 points | 2 comments)
15. Show HN: TypeSchema – A JSON specification to describe data models (73 points | 31 comments)
16. Show HN: Pneumatic – free open-source workflow software (19 points | 2 comments)
17. U.S. Consumer Watchdog Cautions Businesses on Surveillance of Workers (57 points | 9 comments)
18. Viva Labs (YC W22) is hiring a video/image AI research lead ( | hide)
19. The Lion of St. Mark's Square in Venice Is Chinese (107 points | 37 comments)
20. Species in Pieces (28 points | 4 comments)
21. ST Book, the Notebook Atari ST (18 points | 4 comments)
22. The Anvil Text Editor (89 points | 68 comments)
23. Boeing 787s must be reset every 51 days or 'misleading data' is shown to pilots (103 points | 105 comments)
24. Data viz project that maps all earthquakes by magnitude (55 points | 10 comments)
25. Rsbuild – A Better Vite? (4 points | 1 comment)
26. Rider is now free for non-commercial use (669 points | 322 comments)
27. Riot Games: Peeking into Valorant's Netcode (2020) (134 points | 54 comments)
28. Self-Documenting Code (51 points | 95 comments)
29. BYD EV teardown in Japan reveals secrets to its affordability (97 points | 170 comments)
30. Working with Igalia to Improve RISC-V LLVM Continuous Integration (22 points | 6 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, October 25, 2024 at 2:50 AM UTC
